title: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers
text: mgi.20240527 package R data annotation tool designed provide Mouse Genome Informatics (MGI) gene marker identifiers, symbols, names. offers essential functionality quick mapping symbols, identifiers, names, well converting Entrez Ensembl gene identifiers, aligned latest gene models. package based data release May 27, 2024, ensuring users access current information available genomic research needs. package may useful need fast, offline solution mouse gene marker remapping comfortable data pinned May 27, 2024 release. Note authors package affiliated original MGI data providers.

title: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers
text: list gene markers returned function markers() corresponds associated gene model existed 27 May 2024.
code: library(mgi.20240527)  markers() #> # A tibble: 71,489 × 15 #>    mrk_id mrk_type mrk_symbol mrk_name genome_build entrez_gene_id ncbi_gene_chr #>    <chr>  <chr>    <chr>      <chr>    <chr>        <chr>          <chr>         #>  1 MGI:8… Gene     a          nonagou… GRCm39       50518          2             #>  2 MGI:8… Gene     Pzp        PZP, al… GRCm39       11287          6             #>  3 MGI:8… Gene     Abl1       c-abl o… GRCm39       11350          2             #>  4 MGI:8… Gene     Abl2       ABL pro… GRCm39       11352          1             #>  5 MGI:8… Gene     Scgb1b27   secreto… GRCm39       11354          7             #>  6 MGI:8… Gene     Scgb2b27   secreto… GRCm39       233099         7             #>  7 MGI:8… Gene     Scgb2b26   secreto… GRCm39       110187         7             #>  8 MGI:8… Gene     Acadl      acyl-Co… GRCm39       11363          1             #>  9 MGI:8… Gene     Acadm      acyl-Co… GRCm39       11364          3             #> 10 MGI:8… Gene     Acads      acyl-Co… GRCm39       11409          5             #> # ℹ 71,479 more rows #> # ℹ 8 more variables: ncbi_gene_start <int>, ncbi_gene_end <int>, #> #   ncbi_gene_strand <chr>, ensembl_gene_id <chr>, ensembl_gene_chr <chr>, #> #   ensembl_gene_start <int>, ensembl_gene_end <int>, ensembl_gene_strand <chr>

title: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers
code: # As of 27 May 2024, Dcdc3 symbol is deprecated in favor of Rp1. update_symbol("Dcdc3") #> [1] "Rp1" # Because Dcdc3 is remapped to Rp1 both symbols are mapped to MGI:1341105. symbol_to_marker_id("Dcdc3") #> [1] "MGI:1341105" symbol_to_marker_id("Rp1") #> [1] "MGI:1341105" symbol_to_marker_id("Dcdc3") #> [1] "MGI:1341105" symbol_to_ensembl_id("Rp1") #> [1] "ENSMUSG00000025900"

title: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers
code: markers("MGI:87860") #> # A tibble: 1 × 15 #>   mrk_id  mrk_type mrk_symbol mrk_name genome_build entrez_gene_id ncbi_gene_chr #>   <chr>   <chr>    <chr>      <chr>    <chr>        <chr>          <chr>         #> 1 MGI:87… Gene     Abl2       ABL pro… GRCm39       11352          1             #> # ℹ 8 more variables: ncbi_gene_start <int>, ncbi_gene_end <int>, #> #   ncbi_gene_strand <chr>, ensembl_gene_id <chr>, ensembl_gene_chr <chr>, #> #   ensembl_gene_start <int>, ensembl_gene_end <int>, ensembl_gene_strand <chr> markers("ENSMUSG00000066583", "ensembl_gene_id") #> # A tibble: 1 × 15 #>   ensembl_gene_id    mrk_id    mrk_type mrk_symbol mrk_name         genome_build #>   <chr>              <chr>     <chr>    <chr>      <chr>            <chr>        #> 1 ENSMUSG00000066583 MGI:87862 Gene     Scgb1b27   secretoglobin, … GRCm39       #> # ℹ 9 more variables: entrez_gene_id <chr>, ncbi_gene_chr <chr>, #> #   ncbi_gene_start <int>, ncbi_gene_end <int>, ncbi_gene_strand <chr>, #> #   ensembl_gene_chr <chr>, ensembl_gene_start <int>, ensembl_gene_end <int>, #> #   ensembl_gene_strand <chr>

title: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers
code: symbols <- c(   "Xkr4",   "LOC102640625",   "sid2057",   "Sox17",   "ENSMUSG00000074760",   "R75157",   "6430567E01Rik",   "VINAS" ) # Current MGI marker symbols as of 2024-05-27. update_symbol(symbols) #> [1] "Xkr4"          NA              "1110004F10Rik" "Sox17"         #> [5] "1700010L13Rik" "Zyx"           "Zzz3"          "1500026H17Rik" # Map MGI marker symbols to marker identifiers. symbol_to_marker_id(symbols) #> [1] "MGI:3528744" NA            "MGI:1929274" "MGI:107543"  "MGI:1922878" #> [6] "MGI:103072"  "MGI:1920453" "MGI:1916252" # Map MGI marker symbols to Ensembl identifiers. symbol_to_ensembl_id(symbols) #> [1] "ENSMUSG00000051951" NA                   "ENSMUSG00000030663" #> [4] "ENSMUSG00000025902" NA                   "ENSMUSG00000029860" #> [7] "ENSMUSG00000039068" "ENSMUSG00000097383" # Map MGI marker symbols to Entrez identifiers. symbol_to_entrez_id(symbols) #> [1] "497097" NA       "56372"  "20671"  NA       "22793"  "108946" "69002" # Deprecated Ensembl identifier, e.g. 1700010L13Rik (MGI:1922878) should map # to ENSMUSG00000074760. # URL: https://www.informatics.jax.org/marker/MGI:1922878 symbol_to_marker_id("1700010L13Rik") #> [1] "MGI:1922878" # But results in NA because ENSMUSG00000074760 has status Retired: # URL: https://www.ensembl.org/Mus_musculus/Gene/Idhistory?g=ENSMUSG00000074760 symbol_to_ensembl_id("1700010L13Rik") #> [1] NA

title: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers
text: Baldarelli RM, Smith CL, Ringwald M, Richardson JE, Bult CJ, Mouse Genome Informatics Group. 2024. Mouse Genome Informatics: integrated knowledgebase system laboratory mouse. Genetics. 2024 May 7;227(1):iyae031. Baldarelli RM, Smith CM, Finger JH, Hayamizu TF, McCright IJ, Xu J, Shaw DR, Beal JS, Blodgett O, Campbell J, Corbani LE, Frost PJ, Giannatto SC, Miers DB, Kadin JA, Richardson JE, Ringwald M. 2021. mouse Gene Expression Database (GXD): 2021 update. Nucleic Acids Res. 2021 Jan 8;49(D1):D924-D931. Krupke DM, Begley DA, Sundberg JP, Richardson JE, Neuhauser SB, Bult CJ. Mouse Tumor Biology Database: Comprehensive Resource Mouse Models Human Cancer. Cancer Res. 2017 Nov 1;77(21):e67-e70.

title: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers
text: MGI main data portal: https://www.informatics.jax.org/ MGI batch query: https://www.informatics.jax.org/batch MouseMine: https://www.mousemine.org/mousemine/begin.org.Mm.eg.db AnnotationDbi biomaRt

title: MGI markers — markers
text: markers() provides data set MGI markers current associated genomic location. current mean 27 May 2024. Use query parameter retrieve subset data. query can : marker identifier, var "mrk_id" (default); marker symbol, var "mrk_symbol"; Entrez gene identifier, var "entrez_gene_id"; Ensembl gene identifier, var "ensembl_gene_id".

title: MGI markers — markers
text: query character vector query terms used filtering returned data set MGI markers. var string, one : "mrk_id", marker identifiers; "mrk_symbol", marker symbols; "entrez_gene_id", Entrez gene identifiers, "ensembl_gene_id" Ensembl gene identifiers.

title: MGI markers — markers
text: tibble 15 variables: mrk_id: MGI marker identifier; mrk_type: MGI marker type; mrk_symbol: MGI marker symbol; mrk_name: MGI marker name. genome_build: Mouse genome build: always "GRCm39". entrez_gene_id: Entrez gene identifier. ncbi_gene_chr: Chromosome name, following NCBI's gene model. ncbi_gene_start: Chromosome start position, following NCBI's gene model. ncbi_gene_end: Chromosome end position, following NCBI's gene model. ncbi_gene_strand: Chromosome strand, following NCBI's gene model. ensembl_gene_id: Ensembl gene identifier. ensembl_gene_chr: Chromosome name, following Ensembl's gene model. ensembl_gene_start: Chromosome start position, following Ensembl's gene model. ensembl_gene_end: Chromosome end position, following Ensembl's gene model. ensembl_gene_strand: Chromosome strand, following Ensembl's gene model.

title: MGI markers — markers
code: # All markers. markers() #> # A tibble: 71,489 × 15 #>    mrk_id mrk_type mrk_symbol mrk_name genome_build entrez_gene_id ncbi_gene_chr #>    <chr>  <chr>    <chr>      <chr>    <chr>        <chr>          <chr>         #>  1 MGI:8… Gene     a          nonagou… GRCm39       50518          2             #>  2 MGI:8… Gene     Pzp        PZP, al… GRCm39       11287          6             #>  3 MGI:8… Gene     Abl1       c-abl o… GRCm39       11350          2             #>  4 MGI:8… Gene     Abl2       ABL pro… GRCm39       11352          1             #>  5 MGI:8… Gene     Scgb1b27   secreto… GRCm39       11354          7             #>  6 MGI:8… Gene     Scgb2b27   secreto… GRCm39       233099         7             #>  7 MGI:8… Gene     Scgb2b26   secreto… GRCm39       110187         7             #>  8 MGI:8… Gene     Acadl      acyl-Co… GRCm39       11363          1             #>  9 MGI:8… Gene     Acadm      acyl-Co… GRCm39       11364          3             #> 10 MGI:8… Gene     Acads      acyl-Co… GRCm39       11409          5             #> # ℹ 71,479 more rows #> # ℹ 8 more variables: ncbi_gene_start <int>, ncbi_gene_end <int>, #> #   ncbi_gene_strand <chr>, ensembl_gene_id <chr>, ensembl_gene_chr <chr>, #> #   ensembl_gene_start <int>, ensembl_gene_end <int>, ensembl_gene_strand <chr>  # actin, beta markers("Actb", "mrk_symbol") #> # A tibble: 1 × 15 #>   mrk_symbol mrk_id  mrk_type mrk_name genome_build entrez_gene_id ncbi_gene_chr #>   <chr>      <chr>   <chr>    <chr>    <chr>        <chr>          <chr>         #> 1 Actb       MGI:87… Gene     actin, … GRCm39       11461          5             #> # ℹ 8 more variables: ncbi_gene_start <int>, ncbi_gene_end <int>, #> #   ncbi_gene_strand <chr>, ensembl_gene_id <chr>, ensembl_gene_chr <chr>, #> #   ensembl_gene_start <int>, ensembl_gene_end <int>, ensembl_gene_strand <chr>

what: mgi.20240527: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers — mgi.20240527-package
title: mgi.20240527: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers — mgi.20240527-package
text: Mouse Genome Informatics (MGI) marker symbol identifiers, easy crosswalks Ensembl Entrez gene identifiers based reports: list mouse genetic markers (MRK_List2.rpt) MGI gene model coordinates (MGI_Gene_Model_Coord.rpt), obtained MGI database Baldarelli et al. (2024) https://www.informatics.jax.org/downloads/reports.

title: mgi.20240527: MGI Marker Symbol and Identifiers — mgi.20240527-package
text: Maintainer: Ramiro Magno rmagno@pattern.institute (ORCID) contributors: Pattern Institute [copyright holder, funder]

title: MGI marker mapping — symbol_map
text: symbol_map() provides map MGI marker symbols recent symbol, can , MGI marker identifiers names.

title: MGI marker mapping — symbol_map
text: tibble four variables: : "" marker symbol. : "" marker symbol, .e. recent marker symbol. cases coincides symbol always. mrk_id: Marker identifier. mrk_name: Marker name.

title: MGI marker mapping — symbol_map
code: symbol_map() #> # A tibble: 935,897 × 4 #>    from              to                mrk_id      mrk_name                      #>    <chr>             <chr>             <chr>       <chr>                         #>  1 03B03F            03B03F            MGI:1341858 DNA segment, 03B03F (Researc… #>  2 03B03R            03B03R            MGI:1341869 DNA segment, 03B03R (Researc… #>  3 03.MMHAP34FRA.seq 03.MMHAP34FRA.seq MGI:1337005 DNA segment, 03.MMHAP34FRA.s… #>  4 0610005C13Rik     0610005C13Rik     MGI:1918911 RIKEN cDNA 0610005C13 gene    #>  5 0610006L08Rik     0610006L08Rik     MGI:1923503 RIKEN cDNA 0610006L08 gene    #>  6 0610008J02Rik     0610008J02Rik     MGI:1925547 RIKEN cDNA 0610008J02 gene    #>  7 0610009E02Rik     0610009E02Rik     MGI:3698435 RIKEN cDNA 0610009E02 gene    #>  8 0610009F21Rik     0610009F21Rik     MGI:1918921 RIKEN cDNA 0610009F21 gene    #>  9 0610009K14Rik     0610009K14Rik     MGI:1918931 RIKEN cDNA 0610009K14 gene    #> 10 0610009L18Rik     0610009L18Rik     MGI:1914088 RIKEN cDNA 0610009L18 gene    #> # ℹ 935,887 more rows

title: Crosswalks for MGI markers — update_symbol
text: Crosswalks involving MGI gene symbols, identifiers, Entrez gene identifiers Ensembl gene identifiers.

title: Crosswalks for MGI markers — update_symbol
code: update_symbol(symbol)  symbol_to_marker_id(symbol)  marker_id_to_ensembl_id(marker_id)  ensembl_id_to_marker_id(ensembl_id)  marker_id_to_entrez_id(marker_id)  entrez_id_to_marker_id(entrez_id)  symbol_to_ensembl_id(symbol)  marker_id_to_symbol(marker_id)  ensembl_id_to_symbol(ensembl_id)  symbol_to_entrez_id(symbol)

title: Crosswalks for MGI markers — update_symbol
text: symbol character vector marker symbols. marker_id character vector MGI marker identifiers. ensembl_id character vector Ensembl gene identifiers. entrez_id character vector Entrez gene identifiers.

title: Crosswalks for MGI markers — update_symbol
text: character mapped marker symbols identifiers (27 May 2024).

title: Crosswalks for MGI markers — update_symbol
text: Mappings Entrez Ensembl gene identifiers provided identifiers valid 27 May 2024, words, mappings identifiers deprecated results NA. update_symbol() maps (potentially old) symbols --date symbols. symbol_to_marker_id() maps (potentially old) symbols marker identifiers. symbol_to_ensembl_id() maps (potentially old) symbols Ensembl identifiers. symbol_to_entrez_id() maps (potentially old) symbols Entrez gene identifiers. marker_id_to_symbol() maps MGI gene markers identifiers marker symbols. marker_id_to_ensembl_id() maps MGI gene markers identifiers Ensembl gene identifiers. marker_id_to_entrez_id() maps MGI gene markers identifiers Entrez gene identifiers. ensembl_id_to_marker_id() maps Ensembl gene identifiers MGI gene markers identifiers. ensembl_id_to_symbol() maps Ensembl gene identifiers marker symbols. entrez_id_to_marker_id() maps Entrez gene identifiers MGI gene markers identifiers.

title: Crosswalks for MGI markers — update_symbol
code: symbols <- c( "Xkr4", "LOC102640625", "sid2057", "Sox17", "ENSMUSG00000074760", "R75157", "6430567E01Rik", "VINAS" )  # Current MGI marker symbols as of 2024-05-27. update_symbol(symbols) #> [1] "Xkr4"          NA              "1110004F10Rik" "Sox17"         #> [5] "1700010L13Rik" "Zyx"           "Zzz3"          "1500026H17Rik"  # Map MGI marker symbols to marker identifiers. symbol_to_marker_id(symbols) #> [1] "MGI:3528744" NA            "MGI:1929274" "MGI:107543"  "MGI:1922878" #> [6] "MGI:103072"  "MGI:1920453" "MGI:1916252"  # Map MGI marker symbols to Ensembl identifiers. symbol_to_ensembl_id(symbols) #> [1] "ENSMUSG00000051951" NA                   "ENSMUSG00000030663" #> [4] "ENSMUSG00000025902" NA                   "ENSMUSG00000029860" #> [7] "ENSMUSG00000039068" "ENSMUSG00000097383"  # Map MGI marker symbols to Entrez identifiers. symbol_to_entrez_id(symbols) #> [1] "497097" NA       "56372"  "20671"  NA       "22793"  "108946" "69002"   # Deprecated Ensembl identifier, e.g. 1700010L13Rik (MGI:1922878) should map # to ENSMUSG00000074760. # URL: https://www.informatics.jax.org/marker/MGI:1922878 symbol_to_marker_id("1700010L13Rik") #> [1] "MGI:1922878"  # But results in `NA` because ENSMUSG00000074760 has status Retired: # URL: https://www.ensembl.org/Mus_musculus/Gene/Idhistory?g=ENSMUSG00000074760 symbol_to_ensembl_id("1700010L13Rik") #> [1] NA
